response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe will significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its value and the benefits it offers, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $10,000. This represents a substantial savings compared to its market value of $12,000 and provides you with an opportunity to maximize your investment. I look forward to your consideration and hope to discuss how this product can contribute to your success.", "product_price": 10000}
